blocks.name: fimaxre
blocks.content: A finite set of real numbers has a maximum. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 3-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimaxre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))))
  syl3an1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wor(clt, c0))
  mpi(wss(c0, cr), wor(clt, c0), wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fimaxg(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, wss(c0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  anassrs(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  biimprd(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  3bitr2d(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  leloed(cv(s1), cv(s0), wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  adantrl(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s1))
  adantrr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s0))
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  orbi2i(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  equcom(s0, s1)
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  neor(cv(s0), cv(s1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fimaxre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0))))
  syl3an1(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, c0 ‚àà Fin, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0))), < ‚â∫ c0)
  mpi(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, < ‚â∫ c0, < ‚â∫ ‚Ñù)
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fimaxg(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, c0 ‚àà Fin, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0)))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0), s1[‚â§]s0)
  anassrs(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c0, ((s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0)‚Üí s1[‚â§]s0))
  biimprd((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)), (s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0), s1[‚â§]s0)
  3bitr2d((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)), s1[‚â§]s0, (s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0), (s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0), (s0 = s1 ‚à® s1[<]s0))
  leloed(s1, s0, (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)))
  adantrl(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ssel2(c0, cr, s1)
  adantrr(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ssel2(c0, cr, s0)
  a1i((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)), ((s0 = s1 ‚à® s1[<]s0)‚Üî(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)))
  bitri((s0 = s1 ‚à® s1[<]s0), (s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0), (s1[<]s0 ‚à® s0 = s1))
  orcom(s0 = s1, s1[<]s0)
  orbi2i(s1[<]s0, s0 = s1, s1 = s0)
  equcom(s0, s1)
  a1i((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)), ((s0 = s1 ‚à® s1[<]s0)‚Üî(s0 ‚â† s1 ‚Üí s1[<]s0)))
  neor(s0, s1, s1[<]s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà c0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm fimaxreOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

} = {
  mpd(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))))
  syl3an1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wor(clt, c0))
  mpi(wss(c0, cr), wor(clt, c0), wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fimaxg(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, wss(c0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  anassrs(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wi(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  imp(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  anim12d(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ssel(c0, cr, cv(s0))
  ssel(c0, cr, cv(s1))
  biimprd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  leloe(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  3bitri(wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  orbi2i(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

  orcom(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  neor(cv(s0), cv(s1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fimaxre2
blocks.content: A nonempty finite set of real numbers has an upper bound. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 27-May-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimaxre2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dne(c0, emptycls, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wi(wceq(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  sylancr(wceq(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(nat0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, nat0)))
  0re()
  rzal(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, nat0))
  brralrspcev(s1, s0, nat0, cr, c0, cv(s1), cle)
  syld(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  3expia(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  fimaxre(s0, s1, c0)
  adantr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  ssrexv(s0, c0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fimaxre2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚àà Fin)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

} = {

blocks.name: negfi
blocks.content: The negation of a finite set of real numbers is finite. (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm negfi(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  biimpa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), cfn))
  3bitrd(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), cfn), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), cfn))
  bitr4d(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(cdm(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), cfn))
  eleq1d(c0, cfn, cdm(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), wss(c0, cr))
  eqcomd(c0, cdm(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), wss(c0, cr))
  syl(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cdm(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, c0, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr))
  syl6(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  dmmptg(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)), cr)
  mp1i(wss(c0, cr), wb(wcel(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(cdm(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), cfn)), wfun(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))))
  funmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))
  fundmfibi(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(wss(c0, cr), wb(wcel(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), cfn)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), universe), wf1(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), c0, crab(hs1, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0))))
  mptexd(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)), universe, wss(c0, cr))
  ssex(c0, cr)
  reex()
  syl(wss(c0, cr), wf1(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), c0, crab(hs1, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0))), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), c0, crab(hs1, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0))))
  negf1o(hs1, hs0, c0, cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))))
  f1of1(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), c0, crab(hs1, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0)))
  f1vrnfibi(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), universe, c0, crab(hs1, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0)))
  eleq1d(crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), cfn, crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), wss(c0, cr))
  3eqtr4g(crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), cab(s0, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0))))), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0))), wss(c0, cr))
  abbidv(s0, wss(c0, cr), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)))
  impbid(wss(c0, cr), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)))
  rexlimdva(hs0, c0, wss(c0, cr), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), wa(wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), c0)))

  adantl(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), c0)))
  biimpcd(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), c0))
  eleq1d(cv(hs0), c0, cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  eqcomd(cv(hs0), cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  negnegd(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  recn(cv(hs0))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), c0))
  eleq1(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0)), cr)
  eleq1d(cneg(cv(s0)), c0, cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0))))
  negeq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0)))
  ex(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0)))))
  rspcedvd(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(s0)), wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0))), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0)))))
  simprr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0))
  adantl(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(cv(s0))), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs0)), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(cv(s0))))
  negeq(cv(hs0), cneg(cv(s0)))
  ad2antrl(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  recn(cv(s0))
  eqcomd(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  negneg(cv(s0))
  rnmpt(s0, hs0, cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))))
  df-rab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, cr))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cneg(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0)))))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: fiminreOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ fiminre as of 3-Jun-2023. A nonempty finite set of real numbers has a minimum. Analogous to ~ fimaxre . (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiminreOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

blocks.content: A version of the completeness axiom for reals. (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2004.)

  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  3bitr4i(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))

thm sup3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0)))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ s0[<]s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(s1[<]s0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s1[<]s2))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  sylbi((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ s0[<]s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(s1[<]s0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s1[<]s2))))), (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)))))
  3bitr4i((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0))), (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)))), (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0)))), (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0))))))
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0))), (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)))))
  anbi2d(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0))))
  rexbidva(s0, cr, c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)))
  ralbidva(s1, c0, (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù), s1[‚â§]s0, (s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0))
  imp31(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s1 ‚àà c0, (s1[‚â§]s0 ‚Üî(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)))
  syl9(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s1 ‚àà c0, (s1[‚â§]s0 ‚Üî(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)), s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ssel(c0, cr, s1)
  expcom(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (s1[‚â§]s0 ‚Üî(s1[<]s0 ‚à® s1 = s0)))
  leloe(s1, s0)
  3anass(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â§]s0)))

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ infm3 . (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm infm3lem(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cr, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cr, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1)))), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), cr), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0)))))
  renegcl(cv(s0))
  eqcomd(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  negnegd(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  recn(cv(s0))
  rspceeqv(s1, cneg(cv(s0)), cr, cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))), cneg(cv(s1)))
  negeq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0)))
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cneg(cv(s0)))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: infm3
blocks.content: The completeness axiom for reals in terms of infimum: a nonempty, bounded-below set of reals has an infimum. (This theorem is the dual of ~ sup3 .) (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2005.)

blocks.name: supaddc
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over addition in a sense similar to that in ~ supmul1 . (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 25-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: supadd
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over addition in a sense similar to that in ~ supmul . (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 26-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm supadd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(csup(c0, cr, clt), caddc, csup(c1, cr, clt)), csup(c2, cr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wrex(s4, c1, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cv(s4)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
  -| diffsw(s4, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csup(c0, cr, clt), caddc, csup(c1, cr, clt)), csup(c2, cr, clt))), diffss(s0, s3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csup(c0, cr, clt), caddc, csup(c1, cr, clt)), csup(c2, cr, clt))), diffss(s1, s3))

blocks.name: supmul1
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over multiplication, in the sense that ` A x. ( sup B ) = sup ( A x. B ) ` , where ` A x. B ` is shorthand for ` { A x. b | b e. B } ` and is defined as ` C ` below. This is the simple version, with only one set argument; see ~ supmul for the more general case with two set arguments. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: supmul
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over multiplication, in the sense that ` ( sup A ) x. ( sup B ) = sup ( A x. B ) ` , where ` A x. B ` is shorthand for ` { a x. b | a e. A , b e. B } ` and is defined as ` C ` below. We made use of this in our definition of multiplication in the Dedekind cut construction of the reals (see ~ df-mp ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: sup3ii
blocks.content: A version of the completeness axiom for reals. (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-1999.)

blocks.name: suprclii
blocks.content: Closure of supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-1999.)

blocks.name: suprubii
blocks.content: A member of a nonempty bounded set of reals is less than or equal to the set's upper bound. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-1999.)

blocks.name: suprlubii
blocks.content: The supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals is the least upper bound. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm suprlubii(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))))
  -| w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))), w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s1))))))
  suprlub(s1, s2, s0, c1, c0)
}

  renegcld(crio(s1, cr, w1), wa(wtru, wcel(crio(s1, cr, w1), cr)))
  simpr(wtru, wcel(crio(s1, cr, w1), cr))
  negeq(cv(s1), crio(s1, cr, w1))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wreu(s1, cr, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1)))))
  reuhyp(s0, s1, cr, cneg(cv(s1)), cneg(cv(s0)))
  renegcl(cv(s0))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(s1), cc))
  recn(cv(s0))

  negcon2(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cneg.s(s0, crio(s1, cr, w1))
  diff.crio.s(s0, s1, cr, w1)

  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, w0)‚Üí iota(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, w0)= -u(iota(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, w1)))

blocks.name: negiso
blocks.content: Negation is an order anti-isomorphism of the real numbers, which is its own inverse. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm negiso(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wa(wiso(c0, clt, ccnv(clt), cr, cr), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cneg(cv(s0))))
} = {
  pm3.2i(wiso(c0, clt, ccnv(clt), cr, cr), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))
  mpbir2an(wiso(c0, clt, ccnv(clt), cr, cr), wf1o(c0, cr, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cr, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ccnv(clt), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))
  simpli(wf1o(c0, cr, cr), wceq(ccnv(c0), cmpt(hs1, cr, cneg(cv(hs1)))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cr, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ccnv(clt), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ccnv(clt), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wbr(cneg(cv(hs0)), ccnv(clt), cneg(cv(hs1))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cneg(cv(hs0)), ccnv(clt), cneg(cv(hs1))), wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), clt, cneg(cv(hs0))))
  ltneg(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  brcnv(cneg(cv(hs0)), clt, cneg(cv(hs1)))
  breqan12d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ccnv(clt), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(hs0)), cneg(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cr, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)), cneg(cv(s0)))
  negeq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  negex(cv(hs0))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(hs1), cr, c0, cneg(cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(s0)))
  negeq(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  negex(cv(hs1))
  df-isom(hs0, hs1, c0, clt, ccnv(clt), cr, cr)
  3eqtr4i(ccnv(c0), c0, cmpt(hs1, cr, cneg(cv(hs1))), cmpt(s0, cr, cneg(cv(s0))))
  cbvmptv(hs1, s0, cr, cneg(cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(s0)))
  negeq(cv(hs1), cv(s0))
  simpri(wceq(ccnv(c0), cmpt(hs1, cr, cneg(cv(hs1)))), wf1o(c0, cr, cr))
  mptru(wa(wf1o(c0, cr, cr), wceq(ccnv(c0), cmpt(hs1, cr, cneg(cv(hs1))))))
  f1ocnv2d(hs1, s0, c0, cr, cr, cneg(cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(s0)), wtru)
  renegcld(cv(s0), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  simpr(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  renegcld(cv(hs1), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  simpr(wtru, wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cneg(cv(s0)))))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cneg(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  recn(cv(s0))
  recn(cv(hs1))
  negcon2(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cneg(cv(s0)))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(clt))
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(clt))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚âÖ <, `' <(‚Ñù, ‚Ñù))‚àß `' c0 = c0)

  simpli((c0 : ‚Ñù ‚Üî ‚Ñù), `' c0 =(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ -u(hs1)))

  adantl(wtru, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (s0 = -u(hs1)‚Üî hs1 = -u(s0)))

thm dfinfre(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cinf(c0, cr, clt), cuni(crab(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))))))

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl5eq(cinf(c0, cr, clt), cuni(crab(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))), csup(c0, cr, ccnv(clt)), wss(c0, cr))

  df-sup(s0, s1, s2, c0, cr, ccnv(clt))
  unieqd(crab(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(clt), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(clt), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(clt), cv(s2))))))), crab(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wss(c0, cr))
  rabbidva(s0, cr, wss(c0, cr), wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(clt), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(clt), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(clt), cv(s2)))))), wa(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(clt), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(clt), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(clt), cv(s2))))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))
  ralbidva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(clt), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))
  an32s(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wb(wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(clt), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))
  ancoms(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(clt), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wb(wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(clt), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), cr))

thm dfinfre(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚Üí inf(c0, ‚Ñù, <)= ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â§]s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(s0[<]s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[<]s1))))})

  syl5eq(sup(c0, ‚Ñù, `' <), ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â§]s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(s0[<]s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[<]s1))))}, ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ s0[`' <]s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(s1[`' <]s0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s1[`' <]s2))))}, c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  df-sup(s0, s1, s2, c0, cr, `' <)

blocks.name: infrecl
blocks.content: Closure of infimum of a nonempty bounded set of reals. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2005.) (Revised by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infrecl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))), wcel(cinf(c0, cr, clt), cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  infcl(s0, s1, hs0, c0, cr, clt, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))))
  a1i(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))), wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  infm3(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
}

thm infrecl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â§]s1)))‚Üí inf(c0, ‚Ñù, <)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

blocks.name: infrenegsup
blocks.content: The infimum of a set of reals ` A ` is the negative of the supremum of the negatives of its elements. The antecedent ensures that ` A ` is nonempty and has a lower bound. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2005.) (Revised by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: infregelb
blocks.content: Any lower bound of a nonempty set of real numbers is less than or equal to its infimum. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2013.) (Revised by AV, 4-Sep-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm infregelb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, cinf(c0, cr, clt)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s2))), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))

blocks.name: infrelb
blocks.content: If a nonempty set of real numbers has a lower bound, its infimum is less than or equal to any of its elements. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Sep-2013.) (Revised by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infrelb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(cinf(c0, cr, clt), cle, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  nltled(cinf(c0, cr, clt), c1, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wcel(c1, c0)))

blocks.name: supfirege
blocks.content: The supremum of a finite set of real numbers is greater than or equal to all the real numbers of the set. (Contributed by AV, 1-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm supfirege(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, csup(c2, cr, clt)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))
  supgtoreq(c0, clt, c1, cr, c2, w0)
  leloed(c0, c1, w0)
  sseldd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  sseldd(c1, cr, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, c2, csup(c2, cr, clt), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wcel(csup(c2, cr, clt), c2), wor(clt, cr), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, cr))
  a1i(w0, wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  ne0d(c2, c0, w0)
  fisupcl(clt, cr, c2)
}
